description:
Description
Random subset of the 1991 Arizona Medicare data for patients hospitalized 
subsequent to undergoing  a CABG (DRGs 106, 107) or PTCA (DRG 112) 
cardiovascular procedure.
title: azcabgptca
reference: azcabgptca is saved as a data frame.
format: A data frame with 1959 observations on the following 6 variables.
